decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures and removal spells to maintain a fast-paced aggressive strategy. By ramping with cards like Servant of the Conduit and Attune with Aether, the deck can quickly play powerful threats like Glorybringer and The Scarab God. The versatile removal suite of Magma Spray, Harnessed Lightning, and Abrade allows for dealing with opposing threats while maintaining pressure. The deck also includes value engines like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Whirler Virtuoso to generate card advantage and board presence. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of quick threats and efficient removal.

This deck focuses on generating energy and using it to power up strong creatures like Longtusk Cub, Bristling Hydra, and Glorybringer. It also has removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Abrade to deal with threats from the opponent. The deck aims to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with its aggressive creatures, while also having some control elements with cards like Commit / Memory and Supreme Will to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck combines aggression with energy synergy to create a powerful and versatile gameplay experience.

The deck focuses on assembling a combination of powerful creatures with energy-generating cards to create a fast and aggressive playstyle. By efficiently utilizing cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Rogue Refiner to generate energy, and cards like Longtusk Cub and Bristling Hydra to benefit from that energy, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a constant stream of threats. Additionally, powerful finishers like Glorybringer and The Scarab God provide additional pressure and versatility to close out games quickly. The mana base is designed to provide consistent access to the necessary colors for optimal plays.

This Sultai Aggro deck focuses on utilizing energy counters and +1/+1 counters synergies to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and removal spells. The key strategy is to maximize the benefits of cards like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner, Longtusk Cub, and Walking Ballista, while also gaining card advantage with Rogue Refiner and disrupting the opponent's board with Hostage Taker and The Scarab God. With a mix of efficient creatures, removal, and counterspells, this deck aims to outpace and outvalue the opponent in a Standard 1 vs 1 matchup.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively by utilizing a combination of powerful creatures and energy-generating spells to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. By efficiently ramping up energy with cards like Attune with Aether and Servant of the Conduit, the deck can quickly deploy threats like Bristling Hydra and Whirler Virtuoso. The deck also includes removal spells like Abrade and Harnessed Lightning to deal with opposing threats. Ultimately, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and resilient creature-based attack while using planeswalkers like Chandra, Torch of Defiance for additional value and card advantage.

The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence and applying pressure on the opponent's life total. It utilizes cheap and efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, combined with powerful vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester. Removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push help clear the way for attacks, while Hazoret the Fervent serves as a powerful finisher. The deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy, combining creatures, vehicles, and burn spells to quickly close out the game.

This deck focuses on quickly building up a powerful board presence with creatures like Electrostatic Pummeler, Bristling Hydra, and Longtusk Cub. The goal is to use pump spells like Larger Than Life and Blossoming Defense to make these creatures huge threats, while also protecting them with cards like Dive Down. Attune with Aether and Servant of the Conduit help ramp up mana for explosive turns. The inclusion of cards like Rhonas the Indomitable and Cartouche of Knowledge provide additional utility and ways to close out games efficiently.

The deck is focused on utilizing God-Pharaoh's Gift to bring back powerful creatures from the graveyard. It includes cards like Refurbish and Champion of Wits to quickly get the artifact onto the battlefield. The deck also includes control elements like Fumigate and Cast Out to deal with threats while digging through the deck with cards like Strategic Planning and Chart a Course. The goal is to outvalue the opponent by recurring strong creatures like Angel of Invention and disrupting their game plan with cards like Sacred Cat and Minister of Inquiries.

The deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent through aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing creatures like Ahn-Crop Crasher, Hazoret the Fervent, and Earthshaker Khenra, combined with efficient burn spells such as Abrade, Lightning Strike, and Shock, the deck aims to overpower the opponent before they can establish a strong defense. The inclusion of cards like Rampaging Ferocidon and Kari Zev, Skyship Raider helps to maintain pressure on the opponent while also offering resilience against blockers. Overall, the deck aims to win the game as quickly as possible through relentless aggression.

The main idea of this deck is to put early pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner, Longtusk Cub, and Winding Constrictor. The deck also utilizes energy cards and counters to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Hostage Taker and The Scarab God provide additional value by stealing or reanimating the opponent's creatures. The deck's mana base is designed to support all three colors (green, black, blue), with key removal spells like Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt to deal with opposing threats.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize efficient creatures and versatile removal spells to push damage quickly and aggressively against the opponent. By running a mix of energy-generating spells and powerful, high-impact creatures such as Glorybringer and Bristling Hydra, the deck aims to maintain a strong board presence while constantly applying pressure to the opponent. The inclusion of planeswalker Chandra, Torch of Defiance provides additional versatility and reach, allowing for both board control and direct damage. This deck thrives on proactive plays and efficient resource management to overwhelm the opponent.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana using cards like Servant of the Conduit and Attune with Aether and utilizing powerful energy-based cards to aggressively attack the opponent. It includes a mix of removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Abrade to control the board while deploying threats like Glorybringer, Bristling Hydra, and Whirler Virtuoso to quickly pressure the opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells to maintain board control and ultimately win the game through aggressive tempo plays.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively play creatures and utilize energy resources to control the board and deal damage quickly. The deck includes powerful creatures like Glorybringer and Bristling Hydra, along with energy-generating cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Attune with Aether. Removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Abrade help maintain board control, while cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance provide additional damage and utility. By efficiently managing energy resources and maximizing creature output, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with fast and aggressive plays.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build up energy counters to power up cards like Longtusk Cub and Bristling Hydra, while also utilizing efficient removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Abrade to control the board. The deck is designed to have a consistent curve of threats, ranging from early game creatures like Servant of the Conduit to late game powerhouses like Glorybringer. Chandra, Torch of Defiance provides extra card advantage and removal, while Whirler Virtuoso generates more energy and flying blockers. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent with a steady stream of threats and removal spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing Gate to the Afterlife to fill the graveyard with creatures and eventually bring back God-Pharaoh's Gift to create a powerful board presence. The deck is designed to control the game by disrupting the opponent's hand and board state with Hostage Taker and Kitesail Freebooter, while also providing card advantage and selection with Champion of Wits. The inclusion of The Scarab God adds another powerful threat to the deck's arsenal, making it difficult for the opponent to overcome.

The deck focuses on utilizing strategic planning and card advantage to control the game while setting up the combo of God-Pharaoh's Gift and Refurbish to bring back powerful creatures. Champion of Wits and Angel of Invention provide additional value and pressure, while Fairgrounds Warden helps with removal. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures brought back from the graveyard by God-Pharaoh's Gift. Additionally, Sacred Cat and Minister of Inquiries provide early game defense and card selection.
